freeseawind.lf.basic.rootpane

类 LuckRootPaneUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      • javax.swing.plaf.RootPaneUI
        • javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicRootPaneUI
          • freeseawind.lf.basic.rootpane.LuckRootPaneUI
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
    直接已知子类:
    LuckMetalRootPaneUI

    public class LuckRootPaneUI
extends BasicRootPaneUI

    RootPaneUI实现类， 使用完全不透明面板解决字体反走样问题。

    RootPaneUI implement class, use LuckBackgroundPanel to replace default content. solve the problem of translucent window font.

    The following code fragment demonstrates how to use the picture as a background form: 
     

  public class MyRootPaneUI extends LuckRootPaneUI {

      public LuckBackgroundPanel createContentPane(LuckTitlePanel titlePane, Container oldContent)} {

          LuckBackgroundPanel contentPane = super.createContentPane(titlePane, oldContent);

          titlePane.setBackgroundNP(null);

          contentPane.setPainter(new LuckCanvas() {

          public void drawComponent(Graphics g, JComponent c) {

              // draw image
              .........
          }
      });
      }
  }

    See Also: LuckBackgroundPanel,LuckBackgroundPanel, LuckRootPaneUIBundle.

    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    freeseawind@github
